title: tharuNam idhE dhayaanidhE
sahitya:
taruNam idE dayAnidhE aruL sheyyavE aDiyen uyyav



anupallavi



arumai tirum l marug  murug  arul v kkarul  eidu enai  lav



caraNam



nAn undanai ratnAnganALum natti jnAna gAna siddhi nAda pAda bhakti

narkkunjaradAsan nAn aDaindu un nEshan AghiyE nAnum Or ALAgavE
